alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 9:38AM MST until March 11 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to around 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing snow, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow may significantly reduce visibility at times. Drifting snow may lead to icy roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
